mapper.insert: insert into CompanyVal_reply_TB(rno, bno, reply, userid) values (seq_CompanyVal_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{userid})
mapper.select: select count(rno) from CompanyVal_reply_TB where bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: update CompanyVal_reply_TB set reply = #{reply}, updatedate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
